Class DefaultBuilding

  • java.lang.Object
    • cw3.DefaultBuilding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Building, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DefaultBuilding
extends java.lang.Object
implements Building, java.lang.Cloneable
    Building object containing randomised customers and default elevator
    Author:
    pete

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultBuilding

        public DefaultBuilding(int NO_FLOORS,
                       int NO_CUSTOMERS)
        Creates a new DefaultBuilding object

        DefaultBuilding has customers with randomised requirements. As this is an American building, there will be no floor 13 and the ground floor will be floor 1

        Parameters:
        NO_FLOORS - The number of floors
        NO_CUSTOMERS - The number of customers to populate the building with
